import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customer-service', templateUrl: './customer-service.component.html', styleUrls: ['./customer-service.component.css'] }) export class CustomerServiceComponent { }

Customer Support

We're here to help with any questions about your order or our products.

Frequently Asked Questions & Quick Help

Order Tracking

Find out where your package is.

Track My Order

Shipping Information

Learn about our shipping rates and timelines.

View Shipping Policy (TBD)

Returns & Exchanges

Need to return an item? Read our policy.

View Returns Policy (TBD)

Need More Help?

If you can't find the answer above, please reach out to us directly:

Email Us

Send your questions to support@hardware.example. We typically respond within 24 business hours.

Call Us

Reach our support team at +63 (2) 8123-4567 during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM PHT, Mon-Fri).

You can also use our Contact Form.
